channel.title: SMF 74 Subtype 5 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 74 Subtype 5 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - _51l
item.description: Length of RAID rank data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF7451L

item.title: Field - _51n
item.description: Number of RAID rank data sections Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF7451N

item.title: Field - _51o
item.description: Offset to RAID rank data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF7451O

item.title: Field - _5cl
item.description: Length of control section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745CL

item.title: Field - _5cn
item.description: Number of control sections Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745CN

item.title: Field - _5co
item.description: Offset to control section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745CO

item.title: Field - _5dl
item.description: Length of CACHE device data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745DL

item.title: Field - _5dn
item.description: Number of CACHE device data sections Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745DN

item.title: Field - _5do
item.description: Offset to CACHE device data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745DO

item.title: Field - _5sl
item.description: Length of CACHE status data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745SL

item.title: Field - _5sn
item.description: Number of CACHE status data sections Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745SN

item.title: Field - _5so
item.description: Offset to CACHE status data section Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745SO

item.title: Field - _5xl
item.description: Length of CACHE device data section extension Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745XL

item.title: Field - _5xn
item.description: Number of CACHE device data section extensions Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745XN

item.title: Field - _5xo
item.description: Offset to CACHE device data section extension Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF745XO

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74DAT

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. rch 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74GIE

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IET

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74INT

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74LGO

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MFV

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MVS

item.title: Field - nedmanuf
item.description: Manufacturer Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDMANUF

item.title: Field - nedmodn
item.description: Model number Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDMODN

item.title: Field - nedpmanu
item.description: Plant of manufacture Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDPMANU

item.title: Field - nedseqn
item.description: Sequence number Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDSEQN

item.title: Field - nedtag
item.description: Tag Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDTAG

item.title: Field - nedtypen
item.description: Type number Map: R745CNTL Based on: NEDTYPEN

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74PRN

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PTN

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - r7451aid
item.description: Device adapter ID. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451AID Description Only valid with RAID rank data

item.title: Field - r7451ct1
item.description: Bytes read (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT1 Description Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7451ct2
item.description: Bytes written (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT2 Description Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7451ct3
item.description: Read response time (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT3 Description Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7451ct4
item.description: Write response time (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT4 Description Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7451ct5
item.description: z/HPF Read I/O requests (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT5

item.title: Field - r7451ct6
item.description: z/HPF Write I/O requests (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451CT6

item.title: Field - r7451dvn
item.description: Device number (binary) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451DVN

item.title: Field - r7451flg
item.description: Information in this section: X'00’ = No additional data. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451FLG Description X'01’ = RAID rank data. X'02’ = Physical storage data.

item.title: Field - r7451gsf
item.description: Global Mirror Collisions (GMC) sidefile count (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451GSF Description A GMC occurs when, during the sending of data in the secondary to create a consistency group, a subsequent host update is attempted before the modified track has been transmitted to the secondary volume. The modified track will be moved to the sidefile before allowing a new host write. The counter will be incremented by one when a track is added to the sidefile.

item.title: Field - r7451gss
item.description: Global Mirror Collisions Send synchronous count (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451GSS Description When a write collision occurs, the modified track data which belongs to the current consistency group may be sent to the remote control unit before allowing the write. The data may come from the sidefile if it is full or from cache if the collision sidefile is not being utilized.

item.title: Field - r7451hpf
item.description: zHPF read and write I/O requests available Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7451inc Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r7451inc.

item.title: Field - r7451hss
item.description: HDD sector size. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451HSS Description Only valid with RAID rank data

item.title: Field - r7451inc
item.description: Increment values Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451INC Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r7451sio 3 ‘1’ = Synchronous I/O cache data are valid r7451hpf 4 zHPF read and write I/O requests available

item.title: Field - r7451nvs
item.description: NVS space allocation (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451NVS

item.title: Field - r7451rmr
item.description: Record mode read request (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451RMR

item.title: Field - r7451rsv
item.description: Lower interface I/O activity in msec (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451RSV Description Zero for 2107

item.title: Field - r7451scs
item.description: Subchannel set ID Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SCS

item.title: Field - r7451sio
item.description: ‘1’ = Synchronous I/O cache data are valid Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7451inc Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r7451inc.

item.title: Field - r7451srh
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O cache read request hits. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SRH Description (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.)

item.title: Field - r7451srr
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O cache read requests. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SRR Description (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.)

item.title: Field - r7451swh
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O cache write request hits. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SWH Description (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.)

item.title: Field - r7451swr
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O cache write requests. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451SWR Description (Valid if bit 3 of R7451INC is set.)

item.title: Field - r7451tsp
item.description: Number of tracks transferred to secondary PPRC volume (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451TSP

item.title: Field - r7451unt
item.description: Units: ‘00’ = Bytes in units of 128K. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451UNT Description Times in units of 16 milliseconds. ‘01’ = Reserved. ‘10’ = Reserved. ‘11’ = Reserved. Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r7451xfl 7 ‘1’ = Transfer statistics R7451XFR valid

item.title: Field - r7451xcw
item.description: XRC or CC contaminated writes (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451XCW

item.title: Field - r7451xfl
item.description: ‘1’ = Transfer statistics R7451XFR valid Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7451unt Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r7451unt.

item.title: Field - r7451xsf
item.description: XRC or CC sidefile reads (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451XSF

item.title: Field - r7451zhh
item.description: zHPF List Pre-fetch I/O Request Hits. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451ZHH Description Number of command chains, where - the Transport Mode operation specified a non-zero Imbedded Locate Record Count. - the chain was completed without requiring access to any DDM.

item.title: Field - r7451zhl
item.description: zHPF List Pre-fetch I/O Requests. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7451ZHL Description Number of command chains, where the Transport Mode operation specified a non-zero Imbedded Locate Record Count

item.title: Field - r7452dsh
item.description: Data sharing Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7452xfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r7452xfl.

item.title: Field - r7452dxa
item.description: Dynamic extent allocation Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7452xfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r7452xfl.

item.title: Field - r7452mis
item.description: Migrating/migration state Map: R7451DEV Based on: r7452xfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r7452xfl.

item.title: Field - r7452pbr
item.description: Physical storage bytes read (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PBR Description Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7452pbw
item.description: Physical storage bytes written (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PBW Description Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7452pro
item.description: Physical storage read operations (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PRO

item.title: Field - r7452prt
item.description: Physical storage read response time (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PRT Description Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7452pwo
item.description: Physical storage write operations (short float) Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PWO

item.title: Field - r7452pwt
item.description: Physical storage write response time (short float). Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452PWT Description Units in R7451UNT

item.title: Field - r7452xfl
item.description: Extent flags Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452XFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r7452dxa 0 Dynamic extent allocation r7452dsh 1 Data sharing r7452mis 2 Migrating/migration state

item.title: Field - r7452xid
item.description: Extent pool id Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452XID

item.title: Field - r7452xty
item.description: Extent type: X'04’ = FB 1Gb. Map: R7451DEV Based on: R7452XTY Description X'84’ = CKD 1Gb

item.title: Field - r745cae
item.description: ABEND CODE (SDWACMPC). Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CAE Description System and User completion code (12 bits each)

item.title: Field - r745ccnt
item.description: Record sequence number Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CCNT

item.title: Field - r745cfdv
item.description: Failing device Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CFDV

item.title: Field - r745cint
item.description: Number of seconds since subsystem statistics last collected Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CINT

item.title: Field - r745cioc
item.description: IOS return code. Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CIOC Description If not zero, no device data sections. SMF745DN = 0

item.title: Field - r745clvl
item.description: Gatherer level Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CLVL

item.title: Field - r745cmdl
item.description: Caching subsystem model Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CMDL

item.title: Field - r745crtn
item.description: IDCSS01 return code. Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CRTN Description If not zero, no device data sections. SMF745DN = 0

item.title: Field - r745csc
item.description: Status code 00 = successful processed, 04 = IOS return code R745CIOC ^= 0, 08 = IDCSS01 return code R745CRTN ^= 0, 98 = SYSTEM or USER ABEND R745CEA ^= 0 Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CSC

item.title: Field - r745cuid
item.description: Real CU type code. Map: R745CNTL Based on: R745CUID Description If R745CMDL=1, configured CU type code

item.title: Field - r745dbcr
item.description: Bypass cache requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DBCR

item.title: Field - r745dbdp
item.description: Device in a Soft Fenced state Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dcol Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r745dcol.

item.title: Field - r745dccu
item.description: Configured control unit type code if R745CMDL = 1 Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCCU

item.title: Field - r745dcol
item.description: Volume Space Management B'00’ = Standard volume B'01’ = Track Space Efficient Volume B'10’ = Extent Space Efficient Volume B'11’ = Reserved Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCOL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745defn 2 Data exits in failed NVS r745dbdp 3 Device in a Soft Fenced state

item.title: Field - r745dcrh
item.description: Search read caching hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCRH

item.title: Field - r745dcrm
item.description: Record cache read misses Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCRM

item.title: Field - r745dctd
item.description: CACHE to DASD XFRs Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCTD

item.title: Field - r745dcwp
item.description: RCD cache write promotions Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DCWP

item.title: Field - r745defn
item.description: Data exits in failed NVS Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dcol Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r745dcol.

item.title: Field - r745dev4
item.description: B'1’ 4 digit device addr. Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dfl4 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r745dfl4.

item.title: Field - r745devn
item.description: Device number (binary) Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DEVN

item.title: Field - r745dfl4
item.description: Flags Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFL4 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745dev4 0 B'1’ 4 digit device addr.

item.title: Field - r745dflg
item.description: Flags Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745dnav 0 Cache storage not available set to 0 for DS8000

item.title: Field - r745dfrm
item.description: Format of data returned B'0000’ = 3990 Models 1,2 and 3 or Basic Operation Mode B'0001’ = 3990 Model 6 Enhanced Operation Mode 1 or host supports DS8000 Disk Controller Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFRM

item.title: Field - r745dfwb
item.description: DASD Fast Write operations delayed due to non-volatile storage space constraints Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFWB

item.title: Field - r745dfwc
item.description: Fast write caching req. Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFWC Description Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dfwi
item.description: DFW inhibited Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745dfwr
item.description: Operations delayed due to cache space constraints Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFWR

item.title: Field - r745dfws
item.description: Fast write sequ. Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DFWS Description req. Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dicl
item.description: Inhibit cache load req. Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DICL Description Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dkdh
item.description: CKD write hits, collected for 3990-03/06, 2105 Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DKDH

item.title: Field - r745dkdw
item.description: CKD writes, collected for 3990-03/06, 2105 Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DKDW

item.title: Field - r745dnav
item.description: Cache storage not available set to 0 for DS8000 Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r745dflg.

item.title: Field - r745dnrh
item.description: Search read non-retentive request hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DNRH

item.title: Field - r745dntd
item.description: Normal cache requests DASD to CACHE XFRs Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DNTD

item.title: Field - r745dpdf
item.description: Format of Performance Data returned B'000’ = 3990 Format B'001’ = DS8000 Disk Controller Format Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DPDF

item.title: Field - r745dpdt
item.description: If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Pinned data B'00’ = No pinned data B'01’ = Pinned data exists for the device B'10’ = Reserved B'11’ = Not used Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DPDT

item.title: Field - r745drcr
item.description: Search read caching requ. Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DRCR Description Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745drnr
item.description: Search read non-retentive requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DRNR

item.title: Field - r745drsh
item.description: Read sequential requ.hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DRSH

item.title: Field - r745drsr
item.description: Read sequential requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DRSR

item.title: Field - r745dscs
item.description: Subchannel set ID 00 - Subchannel set ID 0 01 - Subchannel set ID 1 10 - Subchannel set ID 2 11 - Subchannel set ID 3 Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSCS

item.title: Field - r745dsdp
item.description: PPRC pair status B'00’ = PPRC pair available (full duplex) B'01’ = PPRC pair pending B'10’ = Not used B'11’ = Suspended Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSDP

item.title: Field - r745dsdv
item.description: Device caching status B'00’ = Caching activated Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSDV

item.title: Field - r745dsfw
item.description: DASD fast write device status B'00’ = DFW allowed Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSFW Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745dspd 4 PPRC copy pair suspended r745dssd 5 PPRC copy pair is duplex pending

item.title: Field - r745dsg2
item.description: Device status group 2 …. 1… Device in a SPID Fenced state …. .1.. Volume is part of a RAID rank that is undergoing RAID rebuild Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSG2

item.title: Field - r745dsid
item.description: Subsystem ID Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DSID

item.title: Field - r745dspd
item.description: PPRC copy pair suspended Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dsfw Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r745dsfw.

item.title: Field - r745dssd
item.description: PPRC copy pair is duplex pending Map: R745DEV Based on: r745dsfw Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r745dsfw.

item.title: Field - r745dtc
item.description: Seq DASD to cache XFRs Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DTC

item.title: Field - r745dunt
item.description: Unit addr. Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DUNT Description for sense CMD

item.title: Field - r745dvid
item.description: Device address Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DVID

item.title: Field - r745dvol
item.description: Volume serial of device Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DVOL

item.title: Field - r745dvs1
item.description: Addressed device status 1 Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DVS1

item.title: Field - r745dvs2
item.description: Addressed device status 2 If R745SFT = 0 Pinned data (2 bits) 00.. …. No pinned data 01.. …. Pinned data exists for device 10.. …. Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DVS2 Description Reserved 11.. …. Not used ..xx xx.. Not used …. ..1. Advanced FlashCopy enabled …. …1 FlashCopy volume enabled If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Global Mirror State (3 bits) 000. …. No Global Mirror configured 001. …. Global Mirror running optimal 010.

item.title: Field - r745dvst
item.description: Volume state (No longer used) Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DVST

item.title: Field - r745dwch
item.description: Write caching requ. Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWCH Description hits Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dwnh
item.description: Write non-retentive hits Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWNH

item.title: Field - r745dwnr
item.description: Write non-retentive requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWNR

item.title: Field - r745dwrc
item.description: Write caching requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWRC

item.title: Field - r745dwsh
item.description: Write sequ. Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWSH Description request hits Floating point short

item.title: Field - r745dwsr
item.description: Write sequential requests Floating point short Map: R745DEV Based on: R745DWSR

item.title: Field - r745savl
item.description: Available subsystem storage if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SAVL

item.title: Field - r745scln
item.description: Lng.of subsys. Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCLN Description count area

item.title: Field - r745scnf
item.description: Configured subsystem storage if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCNF

item.title: Field - r745scnv
item.description: Config. Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCNV Description non-volatile cache, collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB

item.title: Field - r745scol
item.description: Colume Space Management B'00’ = Standard volume B'01’ = Track Space Efficient Volume B'10’ = Extent Space Efficient Volume B'11’ = Reserved Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCOL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745sfvs 2 Data on failed NVS r745sdbp 3 Device in a Soft Fenced state pending

item.title: Field - r745scs
item.description: Caching status …1 …. Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCS Description Reserved …. 1… Storage Facility running as a single cluster …. .1.. Must be zero …. ..1. Reserved

item.title: Field - r745scsf
item.description: State of Copy Services Function Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SCSF

item.title: Field - r745sdbp
item.description: Device in a Soft Fenced state pending Map: R745STAT Based on: r745scol Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r745scol.

item.title: Field - r745sdcs
item.description: Device caching status B'00’ = Caching activated Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDCS

item.title: Field - r745sdev
item.description: Device number (binary) Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDEV

item.title: Field - r745sdfw
item.description: DASD fast write status B'00’ = DFW allowed Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDFW Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745spdp 4 PPRC copy pair suspended r745ssdp 5 PPRC copy pair is duplex pending

item.title: Field - r745sdid
item.description: Device ID Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDID

item.title: Field - r745sdpn
item.description: Pinned data (no longer used) Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sds2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r745sds2.

item.title: Field - r745sdps
item.description: PPRC pair status B'00’ = PPRC pair available (full duplex) B'01’ = PPRC pair pending B'10’ = Not used B'11’ = Suspended Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDPS

item.title: Field - r745sds
item.description: Disabled for maintenance (No longer used) Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sos Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r745sos.

item.title: Field - r745sds1
item.description: Addressed device status 1 Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDS1

item.title: Field - r745sds2
item.description: Addressed device status 2 If R745SFT = 0 Pinned data (2 bits) 00.. …. No pinned data 01.. …. Pinned data exists for device 10.. …. Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SDS2 Description Reserved 11.. …. Not used ..xx xx.. Not used …. ..1. Advanced FlashCopy enabled …. …1 FlashCopy volume enabled If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Global Mirror State (3 bits) 000. …. No Global Mirror configured 001. …. Global Mirror running optimal 010.

item.title: Field - r745sfdp
item.description: Device is failed duplex (no longer used) Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sds2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r745sds2.

item.title: Field - r745sft
item.description: Status data format B’….0000’ = 40 bytes sense B’…….1’ = 44 bytes sense/ unit KB B’……10’ = 96 bytes sense/ unit KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SFT

item.title: Field - r745sfvs
item.description: Data on failed NVS Map: R745STAT Based on: r745scol Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r745scol.

item.title: Field - r745sg2
item.description: Device status group 2 …. 1… Device in a SPID Fenced state …. .1.. Volume is part of a RAID rank that is undergoing RAID rebuild Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SG2

item.title: Field - r745sgl
item.description: Global status X'80’ CFW & DFW suspended Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SGL

item.title: Field - r745sim
item.description: IML device not available (no longer used) Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sos Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r745sos.

item.title: Field - r745sln
item.description: Length of data section Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SLN

item.title: Field - r745snad
item.description: Num. Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SNAD Description of attached devices

item.title: Field - r745snds
item.description: Disabled for maintenance Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745snht
item.description: Host termination Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745snis
item.description: Problem termination Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745snpe
item.description: Pending due to problem Map: R745STAT Based on: r745svss Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r745svss.

item.title: Field - r745snr
item.description: Non-retentive deactivated Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sos Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r745sos.

item.title: Field - r745snss
item.description: Num. Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SNSS Description of statistic sets

item.title: Field - r745soff
item.description: Offline subsystem storage, collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SOFF

item.title: Field - r745sos
item.description: Overall caching status B'000’ = Caching active B'001’ = Reserved B'010’ = Subsystem error B'011’- B'111’ = Reserved Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SOS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745sds 3 Disabled for maintenance (No longer used) r745sim 6 IML device not available (no longer used) r745snr 7 Non-retentive deactivated

item.title: Field - r745spda
item.description: If R745SFT = 1 or 2 Pinned data B'00’ = No pinned data B'01’ = Pinned data exists for the device B'10’ = Reserved B'11’ = Not used Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SPDA

item.title: Field - r745spdp
item.description: PPRC copy pair suspended Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sdfw Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r745sdfw.

item.title: Field - r745spin
item.description: Pinned subsystem storage,collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SPIN

item.title: Field - r745spnd
item.description: Pinned non-volatile cache, collected for if R745SFT = 0 in bytes if R745SFT = 1 or 2 in KB Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SPND

item.title: Field - r745ssdp
item.description: PPRC copy pair is duplex pending Map: R745STAT Based on: r745sdfw Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r745sdfw.

item.title: Field - r745ssid
item.description: Subsystem Id Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SSID

item.title: Field - r745sunt
item.description: Unit addr. Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SUNT Description for sense CMD

item.title: Field - r745svol
item.description: Volume serial of device Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SVOL

item.title: Field - r745svss
item.description: Non-volatile storage stat. Map: R745STAT Based on: R745SVSS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r745snht 0 Host termination r745snis 1 Problem termination r745dfwi 2 DFW inhibited r745snds 3 Disabled for maintenance r745snpe 4 Pending due to problem

item.title: Field - r745xct1
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCT1

item.title: Field - r745xct2
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCT2

item.title: Field - r745xct3
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCT3

item.title: Field - r745xct4
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCT4

item.title: Field - r745xct5
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCT5

item.title: Field - r745xct6
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCT6

item.title: Field - r745xct7
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCT7

item.title: Field - r745xct8
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCT8

item.title: Field - r745xct9
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCT9

item.title: Field - r745xcta
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCTA

item.title: Field - r745xctc
item.description: Not Used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCTC

item.title: Field - r745xctr
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XCTR

item.title: Field - r745xdvn
item.description: Device number (binary) Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XDVN

item.title: Field - r745xfrd
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XFRD

item.title: Field - r745xprc
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XPRC

item.title: Field - r745xrsv
item.description: Lower interface I/O msec Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XRSV

item.title: Field - r745xscs
item.description: Subchannel set ID Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XSCS

item.title: Field - r745xsrr
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XSRR

item.title: Field - r745xvrd
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XVRD

item.title: Field - r745xvrh
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XVRH

item.title: Field - r745xvwh
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XVWH

item.title: Field - r745xvwr
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XVWR

item.title: Field - r745xwcc
item.description: Not used by RMF Map: R745XDEV Based on: R745XWCC

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAO

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SNM

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF74S5 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF74S5 Based on: SMF74TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF74S5 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74XNM
